questions.name: allergyOrAnaphylaxis
questions.text: Do you have a history of severe allergy/anaphylaxis?

questions.name: currentMedicalTreatments
questions.text: Are you currently receiving any medical treatment?

questions.name: previousAestheticTreatments
questions.text: Have you previously received any aesthetic treatments (ex. laser, peels, dermabrasion, etc.)

questions.name: previousFillerTreatments
questions.text: Have you had any treatment with dermal fillers?
questions.provideDetails: Which treatment did you receive, what areas were treated and when?

questions.name: relatedSideEffects
questions.text: Did you experience any side effects related to the treatment?

questions.name: autoImmuneDisease
questions.text: Have you ever suffered from auto-immune disease or disease affecting the immune system?

questions.name: cutaneousInfectionInflammation
questions.text: Do you have any cutaneous (skin) infection or inflammatory problems (ex. herpes, acne, etc.)?

questions.name: currentInhibitorDrugs
questions.text: Are you currently taking any steroids, aspirin, anticoagulant (ex. warfarin) or certain drugs that reduce or inhibit the hepatic metabolism?

questions.name: rheumaticFeverSoreThroat
questions.text: Do you suffer from acute rheumatic fever or recurrent sore throat?

questions.name: hyaluronicAcidAllergy
questions.text: Do you suffer from any allergies, in particular to hyaluronic acid, amide type local anaesthetics or lidocaine?

questions.name: untreatedEpilepsy
questions.text: Do you suffer from untreated epilepsy?

questions.name: hypertrophicScarring
questions.text: Do you tend to develop hypertrophic scarring?

questions.name: cardiacConductionDisorders
questions.text: Do you suffer from cardiac conduction disorders?
